section.title: Major Changes in Version 0.94
section.note: This is not a complete list of changes, a full list of changes in this release is available.

ul.li: Add support for font auto-detection (easier font configuration). (JM) Thanks to Adrian Cumiskey. Fixes 41831.
Add support for the collapsing-border model in tables. (VH, JM) Fixes 36934.
Add support for named destinations in PDF. (JB)
Added support for UAX#14 type line breaking. Support does not extend across nested fo:inline elements. (MM)
